title: Reckless
description: Sequel to Chemistry.After being kicked out of his father's home for having an affair with his own stepbrother, losing his first love, barely surviving an assault by an abusive ex, becoming an addict, and ending up in rehab just a few months after his eighteenth birthday, Garen is pretty confident that his life can only get easier from here. Surprise, surprise -- he's wrong about that, too.Currently a work-in-progress. Available for free through the author's website.
author: Kate Hellman
